text.en: Association rule pattern consists of three elements. Antecedent, Interest measures and Consequent. These must be set before mining.

Move one or more attributes to Antecedent or click a plus icon next to it (in this case you have to choose where to add it and confirm by clicking Add). You will be asked to set value merging. You can change it afterwards by clicking an edit icon below added attribute.

Move one or more attributes to Consequent or click a plus icon next to it (in this case you have to choose where to add it and confirm by clicking Add). You will be asked to set value merging. You can change it afterwards by clicking an edit icon below added attribute.
